greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n) = gcd(Fibonacci(n+5), Fibonacci(n+1)).
comment: Final nonzero digit of n^n in base 4. - _José María Grau Ribas_, Jan 19 2012
link: Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (0,0,0,1).
mathematica: f[n_] := Switch[Mod[n, 4], 0, 1, 1, 1, 2, 1, 3, 3]; Array[f, 105, 0] (* _Robert G. Wilson v_, Jan 23 2012 *)
program: (MAGMA) [1+2*0^((n+1) mod 4) : n in [0..100]]; // _Wesley Ivan Hurt_, Oct 23 2014
results.author: _Paul Barry_, Apr 02 2004
